745870.name: Prehistorik
745870.description:
Half Human, Half Hungry

Raider of the lost Nosh!

Prehistorik, a member of the T-Bone Tribe, is hungry and ready for a bronco lunch! Armed with Diner-Club, his faithful frazzler, he sets off on his food-spotting expedition. Follow Prehistorik from the unexplored ice-fields of Antarctica, the darkened mysterious caverns of the shady continent to the lush jungles of the Tropics.

Featuring
- Rhino Dendron
- King-Kongorus XII
- Chimp-Agogo
- Boa-Dee-Sauce
- Pyro-Tax
- And many other Chops

Lunch is served!
745870.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
